pr_title: TSK-1331: added documentation for multiple sort-by parameters

timeline.bodyText: "have to be", a "be" is missing. Same for the other docs.
timeline.author: gitgoodjhe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -153,7 +153,9 @@ If it is required to filter the list with multiple planned or due time intervals
  planned-from/due-from and/or planned-until/due-until parameters +
 
 It can also be sorted by using this set of parameters: +
-sortBy = { classification.key | por.type | por.value | state | name| due | planned | priority } | order={ desc | asc }
+sort-by = { classification.key | por.type | por.value | state | name| due | planned | priority } | order={ desc | asc } +
+It is possible to define multiply sort-by parameters.
+If done so the same amount of order parameters have to defined aswell.

timeline.message: TSK-1331: added documentation for multiple sort-by parameters
